title: Perspective-Driven Positioning
description:
Alex and I had to do this twice. The first time, the gods of inter-continental communications were not on our side. It was so worth it to double down on it. Wrath of Gods be damned.

**Topics:**
- What does it mean to have a "Perspective-Driven" positioning approach?
- How do you develop a perspective that's both unique and useful?
- What are the practical steps to implement perspective-driven positioning?

[Alex James](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexjamesmessaging/) is a Messaging Strategist for B2B firms and a friend. Like so many, I was struck by his impeccable carousels on LinkedIn. Seeing that being their brilliance there must be a really clever and creative mind, I got in touch. From there, some of the freshest conversations I've had for a while. Bringing Alex on was a no-brainer.
